name: strava-weather
description: Automatically add weather data to Strava activities using webhooks
author: James Langridge <l@ngridge.com> (https://github.com/james-langridge)

scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w server && npm run lint -w web
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w server && npm run lint:fix -w web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w server && npm run typecheck -w web
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules web/node_modules server/dist web/dist
